reviews.review_msg: He is an amazing prof! super nice and helps all students and responds really fast. his exams are hard af but other than that if you listen and participate you will do amazing. Highly recommend. Very interesting

best prof i've had so far at douglas. Teaches material well and prepares students for the mid-term and final. course consisted of two exams, a paper, 3 reflection summaries, and participation marks. would definitely take another class with him!

Took his class at Douglas (statistics of psych) which was hard but he clearly cares about students. Always accessible for help through office hours and email, frequently paused to ask for questions, tried his best to make stats less dry by cracking jokes. Really nice guy, always dropped hardest q's from tests to raise everyone's marks
I liked going to Stephen for help as he was very helpful. I am still disappointed he would not increase my midterm mark but I couldn't argue with his rationale.

I know Stephen was just the TA for this course but I wanted to provide a rating. I found Stephen to be extremely helpful! Although he did not give me any extra marks on my exam, he was really good at explaining course topics and helping me with strategies to improve my grade in the exams. He was much more knowledgeable than the actual instructor.
